title: Wounds of Attachment
description: Second in the series, An American in Beijing, Wounds of Attachment ratchets up the stakes on Mai Martin, an American Woman working in Beijing. A megalomaniac, Maj. Gen. HUANG, with charisma and utopian ideals about the future of New China turns the tables on the Homeland Security. This political thriller twists loss and power, smuggling and revenge, and the forces of sovereign nations with individual integrity.
author: Sha Li
